DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine the efficacy of collagen cross linking for progressive keratoconus and ectasia after lasik. It will try and determine which is a more effective treatment: collagen cross linking alone or collagen cross linking combined with Intacs, a treatment which has already been proven to be effective in decreasing corneal curvature in patients with keratoconus.
DOC.brief_title: Collagen Cross-Linking for Keratoconus/Ectasia With and Without Intacs
DOC.criteria: progressive keratoconus or ectasia cornea thinner than 400um K readings greater than 60D Central corneal scarring
